name: Bumsub Ham
content: Computer Vision Lab - Home HOME(current) PEOPLE RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS Welcome to Computer Vision Lab @ Yonsei University AccuQuant: Simulating Multiple Denoising Steps for Quantizing Diffusion Models, NeurIPS 2025 Learn More Scheduling Weight Transitions for Quantization-Aware Training, ICCV 2025 Learn More ELITE: Enhanced Language-Image Toxicity Evaluation for Safety, ICML 2025 Learn More Subnet-Aware Dynamic Supernet Training for Neural Architecture Search, CVPR 2025 Learn More Efficient Few-Shot Neural Architecture Search by Counting the Number of Nonlinear Functions, AAAI 2025 Learn More Maximizing the Position Embedding for Vision Transformers with Global Average Pooling, AAAI 2025 Learn More Previous Next We are studying how machines can be made to mimic what the human visual system can do (e.g., scene understanding, object localization, action recognition, video tracking and image restoration) in order to make them see the world, and investigating cutting-edge computer vision techniques for various applications, including autonomous driving, visual surveillance, and humanoid robots (see RESEARCH). We are always looking for passionate PhD/MS students, Postdocs, Undergraduate interns, and Researchers to join our team (more info). News PUBLICATIONS We have a paper accepted to WACV 2026. Congrats to all the authors! November 2025 SERVICES Prof. Bumsub Ham will serve as a Lead Area Chair for CVPR 2026. October 2025 PUBLICATIONS We have a paper accepted to NeurIPS 2025. Congrats to all the authors! September 2025 PUBLICATIONS We have a paper accepted to Pattern Recognition. Congrats to all the authors! August 2025 WELCOME Yura, Yewon, and Hyukjin will join our lab in Fall 2025. July 2025 PUBLICATIONS We have a paper accepted to ICCV 2025. Congrats to all the authors! June 2025 PUBLICATIONS We have a paper accepted to ICML 2025. Congrats to all the authors! May 2025 PUBLICATIONS We have a paper accepted to CVPR 2025. Congrats to all the authors! March 2025 SERVICES Prof. Bumsub Ham will serve as an Area Chair for ICCV 2025. March 2025 WELCOME Dongheon will join our lab in Spring 2025.
